name: Tranquil Sanctuary
summary: Whenever possible, you follow the serene path and encourage others to do the same.
description:
Whenever possible, you follow the serene path and encourage others to do the same. You can cast sanctuary once per day as a 1st-level divine innate spell.Traits

Aasimar: A creature with this trait has the aasimar versatile heritage. Aasimars are planar scions descended from celestial beings. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by aasimars.
